title: At COP27, Biden Casts America as Climate Leader, While Activists Push Him to Do More
description: At climate talks in Egypt, President Biden apologized for his predecessor’s decision to withdraw the United States from the Paris climate agreement.
dc:creator: Lisa Friedman and Jim Tankersley
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

media:content.media:description: President Biden addressing the United Nations climate conference on Friday, one of the few world leaders of a major polluting country to attend. “The United States is acting,” he said. “Everyone has to act.”
